result.purpose: Responsible for HMAC (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) functionalities including configuration, signing, and validation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating HMAC-related functionalities and configurations in separate files for maintainability and clarity.

pkg/crypto/hmac/config.go.purpose: Defines a configuration structure for HMAC server settings.

pkg/crypto/hmac/funcs.go.purpose: Provides HMAC signing functions and utilities for generating and parsing authorization headers.

pkg/crypto/hmac/funcs_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for HMAC signing functionality.

pkg/crypto/hmac/hmac.go.purpose: Implements HMAC signature validation with clock skew allowance.

pkg/crypto/hmac/init.go.purpose: Initializes a singleton instance of HMAC with a configuration.
